txt.en:
'Well met! What have you found?'

You hand him the sack of books.

'Goblins are not really known to be collectors of books or avid readers, are they? A scout returned earlier with a similar story to yours. Apparently they are collecting books on behalf of someone named Gâdh! I am incredibly curious to know what they have been up to!'
Durshulot Book-nabbers can be found in Deepscrave.\n\nSome of the goblins of Deepscrave seem to be carrying lumpy sacks. You should investigate their contents.
Goblins have been stealing books from Gundabad, but why?

Lore-master Rúni can be found at Aslíf in Deepscrave.\n\nYou found a sack of books on one of the goblins in Deepscrave, one of which is an Angmarim book about dragons. Bring the sack of books to Lore-master Rúni.
Bring the sack to Lore-master Rúni in Aslíf, Deepscrave
Durshulot Book-nabbers can be found in Deepscrave.\n\nSome of the goblins of Deepscrave seem to be carrying lumpy sacks. You should investigate their contents.
A sack full of books being carried away by a goblin? What could the creatures be up to?
